resources.string: On Android 12+ your app theme colors are based on your home screen background
Selected model is not supported for current option.
It\'s better to use these models for chat:
Are you sure you want to delete this item?
Enabling Experimental Features can lead to crashes.

This application, which was developed in the software engineering department of the Vira Rayan Caspin Technology Development Company, is implemented in two parts: Dialogue and Images Generation.\nIn the Dialogue section, the user has the possibility to talk with the artificial intelligence server of OpenAI, which is known as CHAT-GPT.\nIn the Images Generation section, the user provides his description of the desired image and the application displays four images related to the description.
